data.name: IntroLead
data.value: A digital space to honor and remember our beloved ones who have passed away. Create and share farewell messages, memories, and tributes to celebrate their lives and keep their spirits alive in our hearts.

data.name: IntroP2
data.value: Each person has their own dedicated page where friends and family can share their thoughts, memories, and farewells. It's a beautiful way to create a lasting legacy for those we've lost.

data.name: SearchOrCreate
data.value: Search for someone's memorial page or create a new one

data.name: NotFinding
data.value: Not finding what you're looking for?

data.name: CantFindCreate
data.value: If you can't find a memorial page, you can create a new one to honor your loved one and share their legacy with others. The page will be set up right away so you and others can start sharing memories and paying tribute to their life.

data.name: HomeMetaDescription
data.value: Create heartfelt memorial pages, share farewell messages, and invite friends to celebrate cherished memories together on FarewellMyBeloved - a compassionate tribute platform.

data.name: HomeMetaKeywords
data.value: memorial tribute platform, farewell messages, celebrate loved ones

data.name: HomeStepsIntro
data.value: Follow these simple steps to build a meaningful space where memories, comfort, and community come together.

data.name: HomeStepsCreateCopy
data.value: Capture the essence of your loved one in minutes with stories, photos, and a personalized farewell.

data.name: HomeStepsShareCopy
data.value: Invite friends and family to add farewell messages, keepsakes, and support from anywhere.

data.name: HomeStepsRememberCopy
data.value: Learn how FarewellMyBeloved protects each tribute and keeps legacies accessible for generations.

data.name: HomeSupportIntro
data.value: When you need extra guidance, explore trusted grief resources curated by professionals.

data.name: HomeSupportLinkText
data.value: Read HelpGuide advice on coping with grief and loss
